price: 7. Waxaanu hubaal ugu aqoon warrami (camalladoodii oo dhan), mana aanaan ahayn (marnaba) kuwo maqan.
arabic: فَلَنَقُصَّنَّ عَلَيۡهِم بِعِلۡمٖۖ وَمَا كُنَّا غَآئِبِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falanaquṣṣanna ʿalayhim biʿil'min wamā kunnā ghāibīna
